snippet.title: Distant Bloom | Console Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Distant Bloom is a cozy exploration and management adventure where nature is your greatest ally. No combat, no high scores—just a peaceful journey of discovery, growth, and balance. Coming soon to PlayStation and Nintendo Switch.

After a long space voyage, you and your crew arrive on an alien planet, hoping to build a new home. But something’s off—where is the lush, thriving world you once glimpsed through your telescope? What happened here? And what role will you play in its future?

What Awaits You:
🌱 Restore Life – Bring back the planet’s lost greenery and create a flourishing ecosystem.
🛠️ Build & Craft – Turn your harvest into useful tools, delicious recipes, and upgrades for your home.
👽 Reconnect – Find your scattered crew, each with their own stories and skills.
📖 Uncover Mysteries – Explore the ruins and uncover the planet’s forgotten past.
🪐 Shape the World – Every choice you make will impact nature and your community.
Distant Bloom is all about slowing down, exploring at your own pace, and watching life return to a once-lost world. Ready to make a difference?

🌿 Wishlist now on
PlayStation 
https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10011092
Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1450250/Distant_Bloom/
